blurb.content: Use your shield, weapon, or armored fist and send your target flying.

subcontent.content: An adjacent character is shoved 2 spaces.
Foe is slashed, and refund the action cost of this ability.

blurb.content: Crash your greatshield or weapon into the earth, sending up devastating shockwaves.

blurb.content: Stride forth, with your shield held before you, battering aside foes.

subcontent.content: Rush 1, then rush 1. After each rush, shove all adjacent characters 1.
Rush 1 again, then shove all adjacent characters 1.

blurb.content: The land itself is your castle, and you will never let its walls be breached. No matter where your allies step, your shield will be there.

subcontent.content: When you enter this stance, or when it refreshes, choose an ally in range. Gain the following interrupt:
Refresh this stance at the start of your turn.
Immediately activate the interrupt effect.

blurb.content: Use your shield as a springboard to set up ally maneuvers or to deflect projectiles.

subcontent.content: An ally ends a movement in an adjacent space.
Shove that ally 2 in any direction.
That ally gains 2 vigor and may rush 1.

blurb.content: Your armor and shield become a mirror, channeling and amplifying the destructive power of your allies’ attacks.

subcontent.content: You are included in an allied area effect.

You release an aura 1 effect centered on you that lasts for the duration of the triggering ability, extending the area effect to encompass the aura. You can choose to be immune to any part of the triggering ability.
Increase the aura size by +1.

blurb.content: Your stance is powerful as you strike, and stand tall, an armored sentinel. No enemy can safely set foot where your gaze falls.

subcontent.content: On Hit:
[D] + fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Shove 1.
You gain aura 1 until the end of your next turn. Any foe in the aura that is shoved is shoved +1. If any foe ends their turn in the aura, you may deal fray damage to them and shove them 1.
Character is slashed.
Gains true strike, and increase aura to aura 2.

blurb.content: You call a challenge to your foe to stand and fight. Cowards are blown away by your massive charge.

subcontent.content: Choose a foe in range 3, then end your turn. At the end of that foe’s turn, you may rush 4, as long as you end each space of your movement closer to them from when you started (if you are adjacent, you don’t move at all). Then, if your foe is adjacent, they are shoved a number of spaces equal to the spaces you just moved, then take damage equal to that number +2.
Foe also gains hatred of you after this ability resolves.

blurb.content: You slash your weapon in a deadly swing sending cutting shockwaves out that rip through enemy defenses.

[D] + fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Attack target is slashed.
Fray.
Gains range 2, and repeat the area effect in a new line 3 area in range. The areas cannot overlap.

blurb.content: Your weapon becomes like a meteor, burning through the air as you hurl at at your foes and smash it into the earth.

subcontent.content: 2 damage.
fter throwing your weapon, it becomes an object placed in the center space of the area, or as close as possible.
Rush 3 after throwing your weapon.

blurb.content: Fill the air with the flurry of blades.

[D] + fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Fray.

area effect:
fray damage. The areas cannot overlap.

blurb.content: With a clap, you deflect a weapon or projectile with your bare hand or the flat edge of your blade.

subcontent.content: A foe uses an ability that targets an ally in range, and damage to your ally has been determined on the foe’s end but not applied yet.
Apply the damage to both you and your ally, but both of you gain resistance to it, and are sturdy against its effects.
Gain vigor 4 after this ability resolves.

blurb.content: Even unarmed, a Demon Slayer can employ ferocious strength and unleash blows with their bare hands that can crumple steel.

subcontent.content: Rush 1, then rush 1. Each time, you may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe. Foes can only be damaged once per use of this ability.
If you didn’t attack on your turn before using this ability, it deals damage to all adjacent foes.
Weaken all adjacent characters after the first or second rush.

blurb.content: You move so quickly that even your afterimages are capable of deflecting blows.

subcontent.content: Rush 2.
Gain +1 vigilance. Until the start of your next turn, you gain counter, and may rush 2 after activating vigilance. This effect can trigger any number of times a round, but only once a turn.
Gain +2 vigilance instead.

blurb.content: You imbue your weapon with aether, causing additional cuts at the very aether of your foe.

subcontent.content: When entering this stance, gain a d6 power die, starting at 2.

description.content: • When you attack, you can tick the die down by any amount to cause an additional aether slash as a line 3 area effect that must include your target, after the attack resolves. The area has true strike. Foes in the area take damage equal to the amount you ticked down.
• If you tick the die down by 3 or more, you also gain vigor equal to the number on the die.
• If you tick the die down by 6, the slash deals +3 more total damage and grants you +3 more total vigor.
• If the die goes to 0, you exit this stance.

subcontent.content: Gain +1 tick on the die for every adjacent foe when you enter this stance.
This stance refreshes if you end a turn without attacking, or if you start a slow turn.

blurb.content: Using dark arts, you summon up a sliver of the demon world, blocking out a dark arena that traps enemies in its web.

subcontent.content: Terrain Effect:
Mark out a burst 2 (self) area, then gain
Delay:
Your next turn must be slow, but at the start of that turn, the trigram activates.

description.content: • When the trigram activates, all foes inside are weakened.

• While active, any foes that attempt to exit the terrain effect during any turn must first pass a save, or become unable to do so until the start of their next turn. If they are moving, they don’t lose their movement but can’t consider the area outside valid space to move to.
• This area lasts until this ability is used again.

subcontent.content: The area has rampart and foes in the area when it activates take fray damage.

blurb.content: The master art of the demon slayers - holding a single blow with ultimate patience, until it can slay the most tenebrous of monsters in one stroke.

subcontent.content: On Hit:
Fray and shove 1.
Miss:
Fray.
After you attack, your weapon becomes charged with energy. At the start of each round, gain a d4 power die at 1, or tick it up by 1. For each tick of the die:

description.content: • Increase the base damage on hit of Wicked Sheath by [D] and the shove by 1.
Discard the power die after you hit with any attack.

subcontent.content: You may also rush 1 before making the attack once for each charge on the die.

blurb.content: Soaring through the air like a vengeful spirit, you crash into your enemy.

subcontent.content: You may fly 1.

[D] + fray.
Miss:

Attack target is weakened.
Create a pit under your target.

blurb.content: The disciples of the wolf titan exhibit such legendary strength that they can rip up the earth itself with their bare hands.

subcontent.content: Smash the battlefield, creating a height 1 boulder object in free space in range. Adjacent characters are shoved 1 away from the terrain when it appears.
Create difficult terrain underneath any character shoved by this ability.
Fly 1.
Sacrifice 6. An adjacent foe takes [D] + Fray damage.
You may rush 2 before or after using this ability.
Your next attack strikes with such force that it deals bonus damage and creates a pit under its target after it resolves.
If your target was already in a pit before the triggering attack, it also activates all exceed effects.
Attack may also create a small blast area effect on its target, dealing 2 damage to all characters inside.

blurb.content: You deliver a mighty blow with wild abandon, so strong that you yourself are left reeling.

[D] + fray.

Gains true strike and creates a pit under your target.

blurb.content: Wrapping your arms around your foe, you fling the two of you backwards with a force that liquifies rock.

subcontent.content: You pick up an adjacent foe, removing them from the battlefield.

Sacrifice up to 6, then fly half that many spaces. Place your foe in a free adjacent space. They take [D] + fray damage and are slashed. Slashed characters are stunned. If you can’t place the foe in a valid space this action can’t be taken.
Sacrifice cost costs 0 hp but counts as sacrificing 6.

blurb.content: You fling your foe into a wall, catching them on the rebound.

subcontent.content: On Hit:
Miss:
1 damage.
Effect:
shove 2.
You bounce your foe, then and catch them mid air. Remove them from the battlefield, fly 1, then place them in any free adjacent space. They take fray damage.
Smash the ground when you land, creating difficult terrain under your foe and in two adjacent spaces.

blurb.content: You deliver a spectacular series of wild, rising blows. Like a cornered animal, your strength becomes greater the more of your blood spills.

subcontent.content: This ability has no effect if you are not bloodied.
Gain additional effects depending on your current hp. Each effect stacks and takes place in order:
You may rush 1, then deal fray damage to an adjacent foe. That foe is slashed.
You may fly 1, then shove all adjacent foes 1.
Repeat the above two effects.
Become unstoppable and immune to all damage while using this ability.
If you are defeated, your next use of this ability in the same combat becomes a free action.

blurb.content: Colossi can lash out with the last of their strength, using the heat and strength of their body to punish their foes before expiring.
